com.interface21.ejb.support
Class EJBContainerDetective

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.interface21.ejb.support.EJBContainerDetective
public class EJBContainerDetective
extends java.lang.Object

NOTE: THIS CLASS IS A DEMONSTRATION ONLY: IT DOES NOT FORM PART OF THE FRAMEWORK PROPER. IT SHOWS HOW TO AUTO-DETECT THE EJB CONTAINER, ENABLING CONDITIONAL EXECUTION AT RUNTIME
Singleton to auto-detect EJB container. Does not use read-write static fields, so doesn't violate EJB programming restrictions.
Does not introduce any dependencies on vendor-specific classes.

Servers supported:

  • JBoss (tested with JBoss 3.0 - "Rabbit Hole")
  • Orion (tested with 1.5.2)

Author:
Rod Johnson
